abstract: Yahoo investors are showing more interest in an alternate board slate proposed by billionaire Carl C. Icahn that was first formed to deliver the company to Microsoft in a now-defunct buyout.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo investors are showing more interest in an alternate board slate proposed by billionaire Carl C. Icahn that was first formed to deliver the company to Microsoft in a now-defunct buyout.

headline.main: Some Support Remains for Icahn’s Yahoo Slate
